body: With a touch, you can cause a creature to recall some bit of forgotten lore or information. The creature can retry any Knowledge skill check it has made within the past minute, gaining a insight bonus on the check equal to your Wisdom modifier. You can use this ability a number times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
name: Recall
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Cleric/Subdomains/Memory Subdomain/Replacement Power/Recall
